text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hayahide... And Taishin? What are<n>you two doing here? Oh,
were you<n>invited to the party too?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: We're not here for that...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We came to have our own party. I<n>had no idea this was the
same<n>location as yours... What incredible<n>odds.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Oh, your own party, just the two of<n>you... Huh? Two? Um,
aren't you...<n>missing someone?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Ah, you mean Ticket? She's in bed<n>sleeping off a cold.
Actually, this party<n>was her suggestion.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's... unfortunate. She must<n>have been looking
forward to it.<n>Aren't you going to miss her?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Not really! I mean, she knows better<n>than to let a cold stop
her...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, she's right. It's just as<n>Taishin says—we've nothing
to be sad<n>about. You see, Ticket promised us.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
She promised to speed along her<n>recovery and rush right
over.<n>Considering it's her, I really believe a<n>miracle like
that could happen.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Ah, okay... Yeah, with all the energy<n>she's got, she'll
probably blow that<n>cold right out of her system.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Exactly. So we'll proceed as<n>scheduled for the time being
and start<n>preparing until she arrives.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
...Hey, isn't that enough about us?<n>You were in a hurry
stepping out. You<n>have something to do?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oh! That's right, I need to find a<n>present as fast as possible!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: A present? From you to the fans?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, everyone went through the<n>trouble of planning this
party for me,<n>so I want to give them something in<n>return.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But... then I started thinking about all<n>the good food that'd
be here, and<n>suddenly it was today already...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Is she for real?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Right! Hayahide, you knew exactly<n>how I felt the other day.
You're really<n>smart. Would you please lend me<n>your wits
for this?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Certainly. I'd be happy to assist. But<n>first, tell me what kind
of gift you were<n>thinking about giving.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Well... I mean, it'd have to be<n>something that'd make them
all<n>happy... and glad... and excited... and<n>overjoyed. A
present like that!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Your sentiment is splendid, but I'm<n>afraid it's a little lacking
in details.<n>Hmm...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I know. Why don't you try drawing<n>from past experience?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Past experience?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
For example, what's something<n>you've received before
that made you<n>happy? What filled you with joy?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... Oh! I remember! There was<n>something I got when I
was little.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
One year there was a big tag<n>tournament I joined. I
remember I<n>wanted to ask Santa for a carrot if I<n>won.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But all I could think about was playing<n>tag... I completely
forgot to write a<n>letter to Santa. But somehow...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I got first in the tournament, and when<n>I went home I found it
under the tree...<n>There was a card that said "Congrats<n>on
getting first!" on top of a big basket<n>of carrots!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I didn't write the letter though, so<n>how'd Santa know? I
wondered if my<n>mom told him, but I never told her or<n>
anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I was really surprised. Santa's<n>amazing, I thought... That
was the<n>happiest I ever felt on a holiday.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
So if I could become Santa... I'd know<n>what would make
everyone happy? I<n>just need to find some flying<n>
reindeer...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Erm, I don't think that's the lesson to<n>be learned here.
Though seeing things<n>from Santa's point of view is an<n>
excellent idea.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
What could make everyone happy<n>and is also something
you're capable<n>of giving? I believe the answer<n>already
lies within you, Oguri.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Huh? I've got it inside me? ...All right,<n>I'll try thinking it out!
Thanks! You too,<n>Taishin, for listening to my problem!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Uh! ...You sure she really gets it? That<n>sudden burst of
enthusiasm is giving<n>me déjà vu.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hehe. The two of them share the<n>same earnestness.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
And what about that story of hers? It<n>was definitely her
mom, wasn't it? It<n>doesn't take a genius to figure out<n>
Oguri would love to get carrots.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps you're correct. But it isn't<n>our place to tell her that
Santa was her<n>mother all along.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: She should be able to find apresent now. Or maybe I should'veexplained a little further...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Control freak. We did plenty—achoo!<n>Geez... Come on, it's
freezing. Let's<n>get inside already and prep our party.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Right you are. Let's make things<n>perfect by this evening
and give Ticket<n>a nice surprise.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
If anyone can make a miracle happen<n>on a day like this, it's
her. If she<n>doesn't pull through, there will be a<n>great deal
of food left over.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What? You mean you took care of thefood already? Ugh, I knew theseboxes were way too heavy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You said I didn't need to bring<n>anything, so I thought we
were<n>making stuff here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry. I'm counting on you to<n>help with all the
decorations and<n>setting up we need to do. And you'll<n>be
working double since Ticket's not<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's really gotten cold out though. And<n>the report said it'd be
sunny all day.<n>Well, we'll just have to keep an eye<n>on the
weather.
